title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1201.2 - Compliance with orders of Port Authority police
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1201.2 - Compliance with orders of Port Authority police

State Regulations

All persons in or upon vehicular crossings must at all
times comply with any lawful order, signal or direction by voice or hand of any
member of the Port Authority police division. When traffic is controlled by
traffic lights, signs or by mechanical or electrical signals such lights, signs
and signals, shall be obeyed unless a Port Authority police officer directs
otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1201.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
